= Details =
{{{
for file in $(find . -iname "*.ZIP"); do 
 unzip -l $file|grep -f tofind.txt > /dev/null ; 
 res=$? ;
 if [ $res -eq 0 ] ; then 
  echo $file ; 
 fi ; 
done
